scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm -C www/main dev" "pnpm -C www/design dev" "pnpm -C www/react dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "pnpm -C www/main build" "pnpm -C www/design build" "pnpm -C www/react build"
scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm run changeset:add && pnpm run changeset:version && pnpm run changeset:publish
